channel.title: Comments for page "Duelist's Aura"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Duelist's Aura"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
That's because your Legacy character isn't in an NRF village that has defeated the Super Robots kaiju. This kaiju's village upgrade reduces the cost of all Arena items purchased with rep points by 20% for all villagers.

It's often better to ask why something is different rather than just editting the page right away in case there's something you might overlook. Some people, for example, don't realize that the difficulty and successes required go up by 1 for missions with each season completed.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I'm confused. For my Legacy character this costs 500, for my White-eye and red-ey its 4000 points
